mail.header: [hibernate-dev] want to join hibernate development community
mail.body: Add more friends to your messenger and enjoy! Invite them now. <http://in.rd.yahoo.com/tagline_messenger_6/*http://messenger.yahoo.com/invite/> _______________________________________________ hibernate-dev mailing list hibernate-dev at lists.jboss.org <mailto:hibernate-dev at lists.jboss.org> <mailto:hibernate-dev at lists.jboss.org <mailto:hibernate-dev at lists.jboss.org>> </mc/compose?to=hibernate-dev at lists.jboss.org <mailto:hibernate-dev at lists.jboss.org> <mailto:hibernate-dev at lists.jboss.org <mailto:hibernate-dev at lists.jboss.org>>> https://lists.jboss.org/mailman/listinfo/hibernate-dev ----------
